constantValues: Service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance that is tracked for an individual case

members.name: SLAKPIInstanceId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the SLA KPI Instance.

members.description: Unique identifier of the SLA KPI Instance.

members.name: name

constantValues: Type a descriptive name for the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance.

members.description: Type a descriptive name for the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance.

members.name: failureTime

constantValues: Enter the date and time when the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) will expire.

members.description: Enter the date and time when the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) will expire.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: regarding

constantValues: Unique identifier of the record that this service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance is associated with.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the record that this service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance is associated with.

members.name: status

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Reason for the status of the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance. For example, the SLA KPI could be Noncompliant or Succeeded.

members.description: Reason for the status of the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance. For example, the SLA KPI could be Noncompliant or Succeeded.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'status_display' is added to the 'SLAKPIInstance' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'status'
addSupportingAttribute.name: status_display

members.name: succeededOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) success criteria was met.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) success criteria was met.

members.name: warningTime

constantValues: Enter the date and time when the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI)will go to a warning state.

members.description: Enter the date and time when the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI)will go to a warning state.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: warningTimeReached

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows information about whether the case has reached its warning time.

members.description: Shows information about whether the case has reached its warning time.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'warningTimeReached_display' is added to the 'SLAKPIInstance' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'warningTimeReached'
addSupportingAttribute.name: warningTimeReached_display

definitions.description: Service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance that is tracked for an individual case
